— Power Hour —

Power hour is a simple yet challenging drinking game. The objective is to drink one shot of beer each minute for an hour. Make it to the end and you'll have downed 7-8 beers.

Players

Unlimited

Difficulty

Time

60 minutes

You survived the power hour!

Click reset to play again.

Supplies

  • 1 shot glass for each player
  • Lots of beer (7-8 for each player)
  • The power hour timer above

How To Play

Fill a shot glass with beer and start the timer above. Everytime you hear a tone down another shot of beer.
